nodes.text: During its mining operations on the planet Aridus, the Galactic Empire established an outpost. The outpost was destroyed in 1 ABY during a raid carried out by the Chubbit resistance and led by an actor pretending to be the Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi. The raid was part of a plot by Darth Vader to lure Rebel Alliance pilot Luke Skywalker to the planet.
